languages.text: {n}Нескольких встреч с Арлекином было достаточно, чтобы осознать: все происходящее для него не более, чем один большой спектакль или танец. С ним бесполезно общаться как с обычным ксеносом — он постановщик, драматург и актер в одном лице. Его интересует лишь успешное завершение пьесы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Нескольких встреч с Арлекином было достаточно, чтобы осознать: все происходящее для него не более, чем один большой спектакль или танец. С ним бесполезно общаться как с обычным ксеносом — он постановщик, драматург и актер в одном лице. Его интересует лишь успешное завершение пьесы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нескольких встреч с Арлекином было достаточно, чтобы осознать: все происходящее для него не более, чем один большой спектакль или танец. С ним бесполезно общаться как с обычным ксеносом — он постановщик, драматург и актер в одном лице. Его интересует лишь успешное завершение пьесы.{/n}

It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

{n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

{n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

{n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

languages.text: {n}与丑角的几次接触足以让你意识到，对他而言，当下发生的一切，不过是一场盛大的表演或舞蹈。如果想要与这样的异形正常交流，恐怕是毫无意义的行为。他是这场表演的导演、编剧与演员，他唯一感兴趣的事情，就是这场表演得以顺利落幕。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}与丑角的几次接触足以让你意识到，对他而言，当下发生的一切，不过是一场盛大的表演或舞蹈。如果想要与这样的异形正常交流，恐怕是毫无意义的行为。他是这场表演的导演、编剧与演员，他唯一感兴趣的事情，就是这场表演得以顺利落幕。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus encuentros con el Arlequín te han enseñado que todo lo que ocurre no es más que un gran espectáculo o baile para él. Es absurdo entablar conversación como si fuera un xenos corriente: es director, guionista y actor en uno. Lo único que le interesa es que la actuación se ejecute como es debido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus encuentros con el Arlequín te han enseñado que todo lo que ocurre no es más que un gran espectáculo o baile para él. Es absurdo entablar conversación como si fuera un xenos corriente: es director, guionista y actor en uno. Lo único que le interesa es que la actuación se ejecute como es debido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンと何度か接するうちに、彼にとって現実に起きていることはすべて壮大な劇や踊りに過ぎないことがわかった。典型的な異種族のように対話しようとしても無駄だ。彼は演出家であり、劇作家であり、俳優だ。彼は劇を成功させることにしか関心がない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンと何度か接するうちに、彼にとって現実に起きていることはすべて壮大な劇や踊りに過ぎないことがわかった。典型的な異種族のように対話しようとしても無駄だ。彼は演出家であり、劇作家であり、俳優だ。彼は劇を成功させることにしか関心がない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige wenige Begegnungen mit dem Harlekin waren genug, um dich eines zu lehren: Alles, was geschieht, ist für ihn lediglich ein großes Theater oder ein Tanz. Es ist zwecklos, mit ihm zu sprechen wie mit einem gewöhnlichen Xenos — er ist Regisseur, Bühnenautor und Schauspieler alles zur selben Zeit. Ihn interessiert nur, dass die Aufführung Erfolg hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einige wenige Begegnungen mit dem Harlekin waren genug, um dich eines zu lehren: Alles, was geschieht, ist für ihn lediglich ein großes Theater oder ein Tanz. Es ist zwecklos, mit ihm zu sprechen wie mit einem gewöhnlichen Xenos — er ist Regisseur, Bühnenautor und Schauspieler alles zur selben Zeit. Ihn interessiert nur, dass die Aufführung Erfolg hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ayant croisé plusieurs fois la route de l'Arlequin, vous savez désormais que les événements ne sont pour lui rien de plus qu'un grand spectacle ou une danse. Il est inutile de lui parler comme s'il s'agissait d'un xénos ordinaire : c'est à la fois un metteur en scène, un dramaturge et un acteur. Tout ce qui l'intéresse, c'est que la représentation soit réussie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ayant croisé plusieurs fois la route de l'arlequin, vous savez désormais que les événements ne sont pour lui rien de plus qu'un grand spectacle ou une danse. Il est inutile de lui parler comme s'il s'agissait d'un xénos ordinaire : c'est à la fois un metteur en scène, un dramaturge et un acteur. Tout ce qui l'intéresse, c'est que la représentation soit réussie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç kez Arleken'le karşılaştıktan sonra, olan biten her şeyin onun için büyük bir gösteriden veya danstan ibaret olduğunu öğrenmiş oldun. Onunla tipik bir zeno gibi sohbet etmeye çalışmanın anlamı yok... Arleken; başlı başına bir yönetmen, piyes yazarı ve aktör. Onun tek derdi, performansın başarılı olması.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several encounters with the Harlequin have been enough to teach you that everything that is happening is merely one grand show or dance for him. It is pointless to converse with him like a typical xenos — he is a director, playwright, and actor all in one. All that interests him is that the performance comes off successfully.{/n}
